Project.Brief history of your project and organi: KnowHere is an innovative video media platform dedicated to the Web3 space, aiming to provide value-added services to Web3 users and realize the value of traffic through its unique offerings. It encompasses three core business ecosystems: KnowHere Media, KnowHere DAO, and Know3Here, collectively building an all-in-one media platform.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: KnowHere Media is the world's first professional media resource integration service platform based on Web3. It combines video news, brand building, public relations, industry events, and resource aggregation, deeply connecting Web3 users, projects, KOLs, and communities. KnowHere Media is committed to supporting the development of the Web3 ecosystem by providing services such as real-time exclusive industry video news, online and offline event hosting, and comprehensive marketing services to meet partners' cross-platform, multi-dimensional needs.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China
